result.name: data-map-wales-csw
result.notes: This service gathers the catalogue information from DataMapWales - see https://datamap.gov.wales

organization.name: welsh-government
organization.title: Welsh Government
organization.description: The Welsh Government is the devolved government for Wales. Led by the First Minister, it works across devolved areas that include key areas of public life such as health, education and the environment.

result.title: Data Map Wales CSW
